## Content

### Real estate boom

- Average housing price growth 
- Housing price by city tier
- Home price-to-income ratio

### Real estate and the economy

- Real estate share of GDP
- Real estate investment to GDP
- Contribution of real estate and construction to employment
- Land financing to local government revenue
- Valuation of different asset classes

## Content

### Demand

- House price-to-income ratios
- Household leverage ratios
- Home ownership ratio
- Average residential space per person
- Proportion of new home buyers
- Proportion of housing by year of construction

### Supply

- Housing unsold/sold
- Housing inventory
- Residential floor space growth rate
- Housing vacancy rates 
- Rent to price ratio
